question: NBA: Will the Knicks beat the Rockets by more than 11.5 points in their November 20th matchup?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for November 20th:

If the New York Knicks win by over 11.5 points, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Houston Rockets lose by less than 11.5 points or win, the market will resolve “No.” 

If the game is not completed by November 27, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Ole Gunnar Solskjaer be sacked (or resign) as Manchester United F.C. coach by November 23rd?
description:
If on or before November 23rd 2021, 11pm ET, Manchester United Football Club announces that Ole Gunnar Solskjaer will no longer be the main coach of their first football team, or Ole Gunnar Solskjaer publicly announces resignation from the position, this market resolves to "Ole goes".

If no such announcement is made public by the resolution time this market resolves to "Ole stays".

Verified media sources will be used for the resolution of this market, especially the official website of Manchester United F.C. (https://manutd.com/), @ManUtd Twitter account, and video interviews or press conferences of Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.

Please note, if before the resolution time Mr. Solskjaer is announced to be sacked or he announces he will resign, with execution after the resolution time (ie. he will stay coach for few more games) - this market will resolve to "Ole goes".

events.title: Will Ole Gunnar Solskjaer be sacked (or resign) as Manchester United F.C. coach by November 23rd?

question: Will Squid Game be the #1 Netflix show worldwide on Week 47, 2021 (Nov 22 - Nov 28)?
description:
This is a market on whether the Netflix show, Squid Game, will hold the number one spot on Netflix’s weekly Top Shows worldwide ranking on Week 47 of 2021, which lasts from November 22 to November 28, inclusive. 

The resolution source will be FlixPatrol, which ranks the most-watched movies and TV shows across streaming platforms. 

The resolution source will be checked at 8:00 pm ET on November 29th, under "TOP 10 on Netflix in the World on Week 47, 2021" and specifically under "TOP TV Shows on Netflix on Week 47, 2021" (https://flixpatrol.com/top10/netflix/world/2021-047/)

If "Squid Game" is ranked #1 for the Week 47, the market will resolve to "Yes," otherwise the market will resolve to "No." 

If the resolution source is unavailable at the resolution time, it will be checked every 12 hours until the data is available, and the most recent data will be used to resolve the market. After December 5th, if the data is still unavailable, this market resolves 50/50.
